caption.title: Impact of SOC sequestration rate (Pg C year −1) and effective sequestration years on 2100 global mean surface temperature for a climate sensitivity of 3°C per doubling CO 2 with a 0.1°C reduction (highlighted by a white line).
caption.p: A range of potential C sequestration rates are shown in the center of the chart, as well as their combined potential (black solid). The vertical dashed line shows the mean estimated potential of 0.83 Pg C year −1 for reference.
